name: Magical Girlfriend
description:
Tom is a temporarily unemployed youth. One day, his girlfriend is going on a business trip. The single life of Tom has begun.
One day Tom found out that the new uncle next door was strange. There were so many people in and out of the house that he seemed to be very popular.
Uncle is not outstanding. Why do I have so many friends? Tom was curious.
So when uncle did not go home to find out the truth, a mysterious secret was discovered.
